thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 31 of 2268
thread.title: Sascha

author: Sascha
title: Sascha
text: At first I did not know what to expect from an online curtain shop. We needed made to measure blinds and had ridiculous Quote: s from other shops. When I checked Blinds2go I was surprised by the options and possibilities and just tried 1 blind to see if it would be to our liking. And it was!! In the end I have ordered 3 more blinds made to measure to a special width and length. Only thing I should have requested is longer chains to be able to pull the blinds up and down, our ceilings are so high i have to stand on my tiptoes to pull them up and down (this could also be something the company could think of when you order blinds over 2.05 meters, but its nothing off putting)
